Posts.Content: keziah23 wrote: My mom had unilateral mastectomy with 34 lymph nodes reomoved 9 days ago. Her fluid had been cleared up to a yellowish clear color for several days. This morning it was more blood colored again. She did sleep on the mastectomy side last night though for the first time. Could that account for the blood when it has been cleared up? Her output is down to about 50-60 per day. Thanks! Diagnosis and treatments below are for my mom, age 68 Dx 1/30/2013, IDC, 6cm+, Stage IV, Grade 3, 17/34 nodes, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Chemotherapy 2/28/2013 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Doxil (doxorubicin), Taxol (paclitaxel) Surgery 4/26/2013 Lymph node removal: Left, Underarm/Axillary; Mastectomy: Left Hormonal Therapy 6/21/2013 Faslodex (fulvestrant) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: blood in drain after 9 days keziah23 fitzdc
